name: Rebel Sacrifice
Lore: '''You can''t win Darth. If you strike me down I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.'' Obi-Wan''s sacrifice gave the Rebels time to escape.',
Text: 'Deploy on table if Obi-Wan ''communing.'' ''Tatooine'' on Obi-Wan is treated as ''Death Star''. Your Death Star sites gain one [Light Side],and if opponent loses Force to battle damage (or a Force Drain) at such sites, stack the first card lost face-down here. Attack Run is canceled.
